lg_commentary.event: general _P1_ passes _P0_ _P1_ to _P0_ _P1_ feeds a [wonderful|super|great|brilliant] ball through to _P0_ Delightful little [ball|pass] finds _P0_ Flick on from _P1_ waits for the one two Neat dummy run and pass Great footwork, great pass _P1_ drops the ball at _P0_'s feet Lofted pass from _P1_ finds its mark _T_POSS__ are on the attack _T_NPOSS__ are on the [defense|backfoot] Outstanding cross finds _P0_ Now _T_POSS__ can mount a challenge through _P0_ Ball in by _P1_ [finds|taken by] _P0_ _P1_ [threads|needles] a great ball to _P0_ [Lovely|Superb|Long|Excellent] pass from _P1_ releases _P0_ [Long|Short|Exquisite] floating pass from _P1_ finds _P0_ [Good|Great|Clever] passing move across the pitch and down the [right|left] [Quick|Well timed] passing [flick|move] down the [left|right] _P0_ slips past his man and [collects|latches] onto _P1_'s perfectly [timed|weighted] cross. Another [clever|brilliant|thinking|decent] move [down the wing|thru the centre|across the pitch] _P0_ [collects|latches onto] _P1_'s [thru ball|pass] _P1_ [threads|needles] [it|the ball] through the [opponents|players] [feet|legs] and finds _P0_ _P1_ [traps|controls] [it|the ball] with his [boot|chest|thigh] and [sends it|passes|flicks on] to _P0_ _P1_ [lobs|heads] the ball towards _P0_ _P0_ twisting and turning again _P0_ twisting desperately to loose his man _P0_ rips [up|through] the [centre|midfield] _P0_ [looses|spins past] his [man|marker] A draw will be a great result for the out matched _T[_TAVSKILL0_ GE _TAVSKILL1_]_ _TW_ need to buckle down and just hold on for a few more minutes <commentary cond="_MI_>20 and _SHOTS_POSS__ < 2">_T_POSS__ need to [get the ball up front more|create more chances] <commentary cond="_MI_>20 and _GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ < 8">Only [_SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_] shots, [its a battle in the midfield|neither side are really trying] <commentary cond="_MI_>20 and _GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ = 1">Only 1 shot, [its a battle in the midfield|neither side are really trying] <commentary cond="_MI_<20 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 2">_MI_ minutes on the clock, chances here from both teams already Terrific skills on display We enter the dying moments of normal time [So many|[_FOULS0_ + _FOULS1_]] fouls. The refs gonna need a new [pee for his whistle|book|pencil]! Sure it ain't over till that fat lady sings but she's warming up right now

Plenty of turnovers here as _T_NPOSS__ give it away

_P0_ [steals|takes] the ball away from _P1_ with a sliding tackle

_P1_ is left stranded as _P0_ takes the ball

Not _P1_'s greatest pass as _P0_ intercepts

event.name: foul
event.commentary: [Oww|Aye korumba], that was a nasty tackle on _P0_
Surely [that's a sending off offence| _P1_'s going to get booked for that] ?
_P1_ [knocks|bowls|crashes] over _P0_ with a double footed lunge

_P0_ gets his legs taken away from him by _P1_
[Slicing|Nasty|Pulverising] challenge by _P1_ on _P0_
Vicious tackle from _P1_ leaves _P0_ lying on the floor in agony
_P1_ clinically takes out _P0_ and leaves him in agony
They don't call _P1_ [The Slayer|The Assassin|Killer|Chopper Reid] for nothing. Hes almost killed [the guy|_P0_]
Ouch that's got to hurt
_P0_ is on the ground and he ain't smiling
Don't know about _P0_ but that tackle brought tears to my eyes
Extremely high boot from _P1_ sends _P0_ to the ground
_P1_'s black belt in [Karate|Taikwondo|Jujitsu] came in handy then, as he floored _P0_
_P1_ Just lost his patience and takes _P0_ to the ground.

Frustration is setting in, when you start to see fouls like that.
Thats whats known as a professional foul
_P0_ tries to run off a nasty challenge
_P1_ with a nasty tackle. Surely he wont get away with that

_P0_ takes it on the volley from _P1_'s pass pushing goalwards

lg_commentary.event: goal Goal!!! And the ball is smacked into the back of the net!!! _P0_ scores!!! Goal!! Did you see that? [their goalie|_P1_] certainly didn't. And the ball [rips|flies|bullets] straight past _P1_ and into the back of the net!!! The ball [whistles|flies|zips] past _P1_ and it's a goal!!! _P0_ wheels away in celebration A truly [mesmerising|great|wonderful|fantastic|brilliant] goal!! Goal!!_P1_'s [desperate|despairing|stretched] dive can't keep _P0_'s shot out The ball [lies|is] in the back of the net!!! Celebrations abound, they wont forget that [goal|strike|shot] in hurry _P0_'s dance ignites the fans. He celebrates in his [well known|own] special fashion Goal! Dipping ball from _P0_ stuns [the keeper|_P1_|_T_NPOSS__] Outstanding Goal! Goal! Lady luck obviously supports _T_TT__ [Curving|In swinging|Out swinging|Swerving] ball beats _P1_ to the line.Goal! _T_TT_ [take first blood|are first to open the account] today <commentary cond="_GD_ <=2 and _T_TT_ == _TLN_">That [strike|Goal] has sent the _T_TT_ fans wild That [strike|Goal] has levelled the scores <commentary cond="_GD_ <=2">_T_POSS__ have struck [pay dirt|gold]. What a Goal! <commentary cond="_T_TT__ == _TLN_ and _GD_ <=2 ">Can _T_TT__ produce a shock comeback Lady luck is smiling on _T_TT__ now <commentary cond="_POSS_POSS__ < 45">_T_POSS__ score against the run of play It's just another nail in the coffin

miss [He's|_P0_'s] [fired|drifted it] wide! Wandering shot heads awall _P0_ runs and hides after that [shocking|dreadful|calamitous|disastrous] miss [He|_P0_] should have squared the ball went alone and lashed wide [_P1_|Defender] clears _P0_ [pushes|curls] ball over Defender back to block, just as it seemed to open up _P0_ [thumps|smacks] it into row Z And the [ball|shot] creeps just past the post That was never really going in. Ohh what a chance lost! Lost opportunities like that can cost _T_POSS__ the match. It looked so promising for _P0_ then. He'd done all the hard work but couldn't finish it off So near yet so far So nearly going goalward _T_POSS__ Have squandered [a great|their] chance there. Great run great delivery but no reward Lady luck has turned her back on [_P0_|_T_POSS__] A real let off there for _T_NPOSS__ An Audacious attempt, worthy but not payment There was no gold at the end of that rainbow run The ball pinballs around the penalty area but finds no way in That went everywhere except into the net Into the net but dissalowed. The offside flag was raised <commentary cond="_SHOTS_POSS__ > 3 and _GOALS_POSS__ < 1">_P0_ is beginning to wonder what he has to do to score <commentary cond="_SHOTS_POSS__ > 3 and _GOALS_POSS__ < 1">_T_POSS__ are beginning to wonder what they have to do to score

Easy pickings for _P1_, he collects the ball
_P1_ forced to tip _P0_'s shot over the crossbar

_P1_ gathers it with ease.
_P1_ makes a superb reflex save to tip wide

[Great|Brilliant|Sensational|Easy] save by the [keeper|goalie|goalkeeper]
[Saved|Caught|Stopped|Gathered] well by _P1_
ohh [he|the goalie|the keeper|_P1_] anticipated _P0_'s every move and produced a fine save
That was in by all accounts, but they forgot to tell _P1_, who some how saved the day
No power in the shot from _P0_. Taken easily by _P1_
[A|Thats a] regulation [stop|save] for [_P1_|the keeper]
[_P1_|the goalie] is keeping _TL_ in the game

lg_commentary.event: start_match It's a crowd of _AT_ here as the whistle blows We're under way The two teams are greeted by a wall of noise as they take to the pitch [The crowd|_AT_ spectators] roar as the players run out from the tunnel A cloudless day, gives the impression this match is going to sparkle _AT_ [spectators|fans] can't be wrong, this is the match we have all come to watch The referee gets the nod from the linesman and we are away The [battle|struggle|fight|war|combat] begins The referees are ready, players set, the whistle blows The fog lifts and away we go <commentary cond="_TAVSKILLDIFF_ <= 2"pri="10">The teams are well matched. We are in for [a real|an end to end] [tug of war|battle]. <commentary cond="_TAVSKILLDIFF_ < 5 and _TAVGSKILLDIFF_ >2"pri="10">_T[_TAVSKILL0_ LE _TAVSKILL1_]_ have the slight upper hand. There's a huge gulf in the skill level. This should be a walk over for _T[_TAVSKILL1_ GE _TAVSKILL0_]_ _T[_TAVSKILL0_ GE _TAVSKILL1_]_ come into the game as underdogs. _T[_TAVSKILL0_ LE _TAVSKILL1_]_ start the game as sure favourites. <commentary cond="_TAVSKILLDIFF_ <= 1 and [_TAVSKILL0_ + _TAVSKILL1_] >=85"pri="10">The clash of the [gladiators|titans] [begins|kicks off]

half_time It's half time It's a _RE_ at half time. It's a _RE_ at half time, _TL_'s manager has to find something special to spur his team on. Games like this make managers. _TL_ need inspiration from the top. The dropped heads tell the story. It's been no picnic here for _TL_. _TL_'s manager cops a rollicking from the fans as he leaves the dugout So far _TW_ and their manager have done everything right. _TL_'s manager is furious with his teams performance this half One gets the feeling the manger will read _TL_ the riot act _TL_ will be on the receiving end of their managers [scolding|wrath] <commentary cond="_TAVSKILLDIFF_ >=8 and _GD_ >=1 and _TAVSKILL_TLN__ < _TAVSKILL_TWN__"pri="10">_TW_ are just 45 minutes away from a stunning victory _TL_ heads into the tunnel to await the managers scolding A half , _TL_ team will quickly want to forget _T[_POSS1_ GE 70]_ is dominating the possession _T[_POSS1_ GE 60]_ have had the [luxury of most|lions share|better] of possession this half _T0_ may have had more possession but _T1_ have utilised theirs better _T1_ may have had more possession but _T0_ have utilised theirs better _T[_POSS1_ GE 75]_ seems to be the only team out there Well the [banks are closed|tide is out|lolly bag remains empty], [no goals this half|no one has managed to break the wall] <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ = 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ < 2">At this stage 1 up [might not be |might just be] enough With the number of shots so far, 1 up might not be enough <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 2 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 8">Sure its a low scoring game but we've had plenty of shots <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 4">_T[_SHOTS0_ LE _SHOTS1_]_ Have had plenty of chances to [finish|seal] this game <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 2 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ > 3">_T[_SHOTS0_ LE _SHOTS1_]_ Have had _SHOTS[_SHOTS0_ LE _SHOTS1_]_ chances to [finish|seal|clinch] this game <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ = 0 and _SHOTS0_ + _SHOTS1_ < 2">No bickies in the barrel yet and [it looks like the baker is on strike|to be honest no one is baking] Its raining goals.[_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_] So far and its only the first half! There are two teams out there but only [_T[_FOULS0_ GE _FOULS1_]_|one of them] is playing football It's a blood bath out there not a football match. [So many|[_FOULS0_ + _FOULS1_]] fouls. The refs gonna need new office supplies! [So many|[_FOULS0_ + _FOULS1_]] fouls. The refs gonna need a new [pee for his whistle|book|pencil]! [_PEN0_ + _PEN1_] penalties already

event.name: extra_time
event.commentary: After a close match the game heads into extra time
It's still _RE_: extra time
After _MI_ minutes it's still _RE_: extra time
Who will breakdown first, extra time it is
It's down to determination and fitness now as we head into extra time

lg_commentary.event: penalties Who would have thought _MI_ minutes ago it would come down to this And now we have the tense drama of a penalty shoot out Two teams, equal till now in every respect,face off in penalties The teams can't do it, so now it's one on one. Striker against goalie <commentary cond="_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_ < 1">No goals so far but now we will see some as we head to penalties

end_match The match is over! _TW_ are triumphant!!! The fans boo _TL_ off the pitch After _MI_ minutes the match ends with a _RE_ The referee checks his watch and blows for full time Well that's that. It ends _RE_ _TW_'s manager will be delighted with that result _RE_, what an astonishing result for _TW_ A draw then. Still a point is a point. Well that's that. It ends _RE_ in _TW_'s favour Wow, a match to remember. [_GOALS0_ + _GOALS1_] action packed goals! _TL_ were slaughtered by _GD_ goals. _TW_ will be sipping champagne tonight. What [a great victory|an amazing win] for _TW_ <commentary cond="_GD_ > 3 and _TLAYER[_GOALS1_ > _GOALS0_]_ >= _TLAYER[_GOALS1_ < _GOALS0_]_"pri="10">_TL_ were up against a giant and the _RE_ scoreline, shows it

event.name: own_goal
event.commentary: Ohh no, the ball ricocheted off _P0_ into the net
It's a pinball in the penalty box, finally spinning off _P0_ across the line
Oh that's a great shot and it's deflected off _P0_ and into the back of the net
_P0_ passes the ball back to his goalie, oh no the keepers missed it! It's an own goal by _P0_!
That little misunderstanding has cost _T_TT__ a goal

event.name: header
event.commentary: _P1_ chips the ball towards _P0_ who heads the ball towards goal
Diving header by _P0_
He just floated in midair for ages, then thunder heads it towards home
That's come off the back of _P0_'s head!

_P0_'s head finds the end of the long cross

event.name: post
event.commentary: Sweet strike by _P0_, hits the post
And the shot glances wide off the post
I'm surprised the post has managed to withstand that cracking shot

event.name: cross_bar
event.commentary: Ball dinked over _P1_ but hit crossbar and bounced to safety
The ball smacks into the crossbar with _P1_ stranded
_P1_ seemed to be everywhere at once, finally tipping the ball off the crossbar

lg_commentary.event: penalty _P0_ steps up to take the penalty _P0_ has a chance to score with a penalty kick _P0_ can make some of _T_POSS__ worries [disappear|go away] with this penalty Can [_P0_|_T_POSS_] convert the spot kick You have to bury the nerves, swallow and concentrate when your taking penalties _T_POSS__ looks like they are playing for penalties. _T_POSS__ can sneak ahead if they convert this <commentary cond="_GD_=1 and _GOALS_POSS__ < _GOALS_NPOSS__">_P0_ can square the match with this shot <commentary cond="_MI_>85 and _GD_=1 and _GOALS_POSS__ < _GOALS_NPOSS__">_P0_ A late penalty now may force this match to a draw <commentary cond="_MI_>85 and _GD_=1 and _GOALS_POSS__ < _GOALS_NPOSS__">_T_NPOSS__ have given away an easy chance for _T_POSS__ to come back into this game _P0_ can seal up the game with a goal here

_P0_ has picked up a slight knock
_P0_ tries to run off a slight groin strain

_P0_ has a large cut above his left eye but it has been patched up and he will be able to continue

event.name: stadium_breakdown
event.commentary: _T0_ is undergoing stadium problems

Heavy fog is causing havoc here at _T0_'s ground

event.commentary: The peasants are revolting
And the fans are throwing flares onto the pitch
The riot police have moved in to stop fighting between sets of opposition supporters
A fan has managed to get onto the pitch and has begun to attack the referee
The fans pour onto the pitch in a full scale pitch invasion

event.name: stadium_fire
event.commentary: Fire consumes _T_TT__'s stadium
Away fans have set fire to the north stand
A flare chucked onto the touchline has started a massive blaze
A speaker has gone up in flames and the blaze spreading around the entire stadium
